title: Salem Bitar
text: Salem Bitar () is a <a href="Syria">Syria</a>n <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="Goalkeeper%20%28association%20football%29">Goalkeeper</a> who played for the <a href="Syria%20national%20football%20team">Syria</a> in the <a href="1996%20Asian%20Cup">1996 Asian Cup</a>.
